::Darkwing::
Darkwing quitly followed behind the council.  He saw everything and
heard everything. He tried to contact Havotron by commlink, but that
is a stupid move with sound wave around

"Havotron, they are getting more bots for soundwave." he said to him.

Havotron did not answer already knowing that Soundwave could pick up
that signal.

"Idiot" he mumbles to himself.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Just replace Ratbat, with Spasstik J :)
>
> BIC:
> "Yes." The councile member says as he moves into the room, and implants
> a small box shaped object into each one. "They are now ready. You will
> leave when the ship is finished being constructed, and when we first
> sense the Autobots leaving.
